mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.robot_id, t2.spare_robot FROM t_play_message_push t1 LEFT JOIN t_play_message_push_detail t2 ON t1.id = t2.play_msg_push_id WHERE t1.play_id = #{playId}

select tpmpd.id, play_msg_push_id, spokesman_nickname, robot_id, robot_nickname, robot_img_url, robot_acct, interval_time, play_error_type, message_content, message_sort, send_state, tpmpd.create_time, tpmpd.modify_time, send_time, tpmpd.is_delete, push_fail_reason, opt_serial_no, spare_robot, call_all, tpmp.id from t_play_message_push_detail tpmpd left join t_play_message_push tpmp on tpmpd.play_msg_push_id = tpmp.id where tpmp.group_id = #{groupId} and tpmp.play_id = #{playId} and tpmpd.is_delete = 0 and tpmpd.send_state = 0 and tpmpd.spokesman_nickname = #{nickName}

select tpmpd.id, play_msg_push_id, spokesman_nickname, robot_id, robot_nickname, robot_img_url, robot_acct, interval_time, play_error_type, message_content, message_sort, send_state, tpmpd.create_time, tpmpd.modify_time, send_time, tpmpd.is_delete, push_fail_reason, opt_serial_no, spare_robot, call_all, tpmp.id from t_play_message_push_detail tpmpd left join t_play_message_push tpmp on tpmpd.play_msg_push_id = tpmp.id where tpmp.group_id = #{groupId} and tpmp.play_id = #{playId} and tpmpd.is_delete = 0 and tpmpd.spokesman_nickname = #{nickName} and tpmpd.message_sort = #{messageSort}
